articles.title: After 2 Monkeypox Cases, Centre Asks For Strict Screening Of Passengers
articles.description: The Centre on Monday asked ports and airports to ensure strict health screening of all international travellers to contain the spread of monkeypox on the day India reported its second case from Kerala.
articles.content:
The symptoms of monkeypox include a high fever, swollen lymph nodes and a blistery chickenpox-like rash.
